content: skill level some experience necessary materials bernat® camouflage 3 5 oz 100 g #10483 renegade *1 ball* note original yarn in pattern bernat camouflage ombres & solids has been discontinued substitute bernat super value ombres & solids additional materials 1 yd 90 cm of elastic cord *bernat free project sheet 99000600297* english *neckwarmer to knit or crochet * french *col tube au tricot ou au crochet * joann version 1 still available on joann com bernat archive version 2 can be accessed at web archive org see also camouflage neckwarmer knit version 3 1 http //demandware edgesuite net/aamm_prd/on/demandware static/sites-joann-site/sites-joann-project-catalog/default/v1400055229433/images/hi-res/project/pdf/p258125 pdf 2 http //web archive org/web/20060823204704/http //www bernat com/data/pattern/pdf/instruction_1979 en_us pdf 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/camouflage-neckwarmer-knit-version
